name: Arsenal of Democracy: A Hearts of Iron Game
description: Taking place from 1936-64, Arsenal of Democracy lets you play as any nation during the era of WW2, complete with detailed models for economics, diplomacy, research, and intelligence. Warfare is also fully represented with all three branches of operations: land, sea, and air.
minimum_requirements: OS: 2000/XP or better Processor: 1.0GHz Athlon/Pentium 3 or better Memory: 256MB RAM Hard Drive: 1.5GB free hard drive space Graphics: Windows/DirectX Compatible videocard Sound: Windows/DirectX compatible soundcard DirectX®: DirectX 9.0 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: 2000/XP or better Processor: 1.6GHz Athlon/Pentium 4 or better Memory: 512MB RAM Hard Drive: 2GB free hard drive space Graphics: Windows/DirectX Compatible videocard Sound: Windows/DirectX compatible soundcard DirectX®: DirectX 9.0 or higher
